index.name: php
index.subtitle: PHP
index.about: PHP is a popular general-purpose scripting language that is especially suited to web development. Fast, flexible and pragmatic, PHP powers everything from your blog to the most popular websites in the world.
index.description: Read the best free ebooks about PHP language.

books.title: PHP Succinctly
books.description: Known for its straightforward simplicity, PHP is an open source, general-purpose scripting language oriented for web development. In PHP Succinctly, author José Roberto Olivas Mendoza guides newcomers through PHP’s basics, which includes deployment, programming themes such as variables, decision making, arrays, functions, and databases, and the creation of a functional webpage that will connect to a database. By the end, you’ll be ready to join the vast community of PHP users around the world.
books.author: José Roberto Olivas Mendoza

books.title: PHP The Right Way
books.description: PHP: The Right Way is an easy-to-read, quick reference for PHP popular coding standards, links to authoritative tutorials around the Web and what the contributors consider to be best practices at the present time.
books.author: Josh Lockhart

books.title: Laravel 4 Official Documentation
books.description: Synced daily. A free ebook version of the Laravel 4.2 Official Documentation.
books.author: Brujah
